list_definition.definition: to look at closely; to inspect closely

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They examined the animal tracks and decided that they were those of a fox.

list_definition.definition: (of a doctor) to inspect the body of thoroughly to check for disease etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The doctor examined the child and said she was healthy.
The detectives must examine the facts.

list_definition.definition: to test the knowledge or ability of (students etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The test examines the students’ ability to speak French.
The lawyer examined the witness in the court case.
